txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing 'Restoring the Three Kingdoms' will cancel this quest</rgb>

'How am I to make a good impression for the Master? The protection of Lake-town is one matter, but cleanliness seems to elude even the finest of my guards. Again with the mud on their boots! Every day!\n\n'If you scrub that filth up quickly, I'll make it worth your time.'
'That ought to do... for the next hour or so.\n\n'I suppose it's the most I can ask.'
Mud can be found throughout the guards' barracks in Lake-town.\n\nYou should clean up splotches of mud left by uncleanly guards in the guard's barracks.
Desperate to impress the Master, Captain Álarr has asked for your aid in cleaning the filthy guards' barracks.
Clean up splotches of mud in the guards' barracks ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Cleaned up splotches of mud in the guards' barracks ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Captain Álarr can be found in the guards' barracks in Lake-town.\n\nYou should talk to Álarr.
